comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: www.ishof.org/Honorees/70/70cgalligan.html After her marriage, she continued to earn swimming honors as Mrs. Claire Galligan Finney, but did not attend the 1920 Olympic Games.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Aug 23, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40B13FA3A5C1373... reports on the event, the National Woman's Life Saving League's annual diving and swimming contest, held the day before at Chisholm's bathing pavilion, Sheepshead Bay. Galligan emerged as one of a pair of champions.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for this information.
